taskbody.context: This procedure describes how to download the serviced RPM package to your workstation.
taskbody.prereq:
To perform this procedure, you need:
A workstation with internet access.
A portable storage medium, such as a USB flash drive, with at least 20MB of free space.
Permission to download the required files from the Zenoss Enterprise Software Downloads site. You may request permission by filing a ticket at .

step.cmd: In a web browser, navigate to the Zenoss Enterprise Software Downloads site.
Click File Portal - Zenoss Enterprise Software Downloads.
Log in with the account provided by .

stepxmp.p: Replace Version with the most recent version number available on the download page:

step.cmd: Copy the file to your portable storage medium.
